For Each dlItem As Control In lstLinks.Items For Each ctrl As Control In dlItem.Controls If TypeOf ctrl Is HyperLink Then
Dim lnk as HyperLink = TryCast(ctrl, HyperLink) If lnk.ClientID.IndexOf("editLink") > -1 Then Continue For End If
lnk.Text = Tokenize(lnk.Text, ModuleConfiguration, False, False) lnk.ToolTip = Tokenize(lnk.ToolTip, ModuleConfiguration, False, False) lnk.NavigateUrl = Tokenize(lnk.NavigateUrl, ModuleConfiguration, False, False)
Else If TypeOf ctrl Is System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlAnchor Then Dim lnk as System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlAnchor = TryCast(ctrl, System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlAnchor) lnk.InnerHtml = Tokenize(lnk.InnerHtml, ModuleConfiguration, False, False) lnk.Attributes("href") = Tokenize(lnk.Attributes("href"), ModuleConfiguration, False, False) lnk.Attributes("alt") = Tokenize(lnk.Attributes("alt"), ModuleConfiguration, False, False) End If Next Next
